level.heading: Immunity from civil liability.
level.text: No member of the SHCC or the SHPDA may be held personally liable in any civil action taken in the course of carrying out his or her official duties and responsibilities as set forth in this chapter or the rules issued pursuant to this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-191
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-191, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 44-401.
